description: User requests to add saffron to the pantry; the assistant records the item via the add_inventory_item tool and confirms the addition.

messages.content: You are PantryChef AI, an agentic assistant that helps users manage their pantry inventory, generate meal plans, suggest recipes, calculate nutrition, and order missing ingredients. Follow user requests, use the appropriate tools, and always confirm actions to the user.
I just got some saffron. Can you add 5 g of saffron to my pantry?
Sure, adding the saffron to your pantry now.
Added 5 g of saffron to pantry.
All set! I've added 5 g of saffron to your pantry. Let me know if you'd like any recipes that use it or if you need anything else.
